General.Name: Jiayou International Logistics Co Ltd
General.Description: Jiayou International Logistics Co.,Ltd, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the provision of domestic and international multimodal transportation, logistics infrastructure investment, and operation and supply chain trade. The company is involved in cross-border multimodal transportation, project and mining products logistics, bonded warehousing, and supply chain trade solutions. It has operations in approximately 60 countries and regions in Asia, Africa, Europe, North America, and internationally. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Beijing, China.
General.Address: Financial Street ChangAn Centre, Beijing, China, 100043
